content: With DALL-E, the sky is the limit! You can generate images bursting with creativity across a wide array of artistic and aesthetic styles.
Aesthetics refers to the branch of philosophy that deals with the nature, beauty, and principles of art, beauty, and taste.
Thus, artistic styles are about execution, like black and white, Marvel, Disney, modern, etc.

Style modifiers will help you with that!

They are the magical keywords you sprinkle into your prompts to specify the artistic flair you want DALL-E to embrace.

Let's dive into some exciting examples and witness the incredible transformations they can create!

title: Create Your Own Animated Character!
instruction: Fill in the gaps to craft the perfect prompt for your animated character.

content: Let's now try to make it in the style of Disney.

title: Create Your Own Disney Character!
instruction: Fill in the gaps to craft the perfect prompt for your specific style character.

content: Let's add a Marvel superhero costume to our character to make it more interesting!

title: Add a Marvel Superhero Costume!
instruction: Fill in the gaps to craft a prompt for your specific styled character.

content: Let's add a Pixar-style background to complete the scene!

title: Add a Background in the Style of Pixar!
instruction: Fill in the gaps to craft a prompt with a specific style background

content:
Enhance the aesthetic qualities and details of your images by using wording like "award-winning," "intricate," or "stunning" in your prompts.

These quality boosters can elevate the final output and give your images a professional touch.

title: Enhancing Image Quality
instruction: Fill in the gaps to craft a prompt that includes quality boosters.

content: Amazing! You've learned how to create stunning images using various artistic and aesthetic styles with DALL-E.

In the next lesson, we'll learn about basic editing and refinement.

Stay inspired, keep creating!
